```py
$ python3 script.py Jenny > greeting.txt
$ cat greeting.txt
Hello, Jenny!
```

```py
$ python3 script.py Angel >> greeting.txt
$ cat greeting.txt
Hello, Jenny!
Hello, Angel!
```
